name: delineo
tag_list: marketing, advertising, agency, branding, creative, digital
overview:
Delineo is in the top 10% of North West full service advertising agencies according to both Crains and Business Link.

Privileged to be the lead or roster agency for a number of leading UK brands, Delineo have spent the last three decades delivering inspired results and supporting clients with a passionate, can-do approach.

The agency comprises of strategic, analytical, left brain thinkers (who we call considerists) and intuitive, lateral, right brain users (we call them inspirationalists) who together find the uncommon in the familiar to create genuine points of difference and achieve results that inspire.

Driven by a desire to challenge traditional agency ways, Delineo is the agency to talk to when looking to:

  • Build brands for market differentiation and competitive advantage
  • Increase sales of products and services
  • Capitalise on existing and emerging channels to market
  • Improve communication with stakeholders
  • Use design for competitive advantage
